page.title: 02Activities in our area
page.content: In our area there are a great many different things to do in our spare time. We are very lucky to have so many places where we can go in our spare time. One of these places is{Camperdown Park where there is lots to do. You can play tennis or go bowling or play pitch and putt. There is a play park with swings for younger children and an adventure playground for older children. There is also a zoo which has Jeremy the bear who was at one time very famous in the Sugar Puffs advert. Throughout the park are a number of picnic areas. In another part of our area is the { {Dick McTaggart Centre}named after Dundee's most famous boxer, who won a gold medal at the 1956 Olympics. At this centre a whole range of sporting activities may be carried out.
